snippet.title: Title: The collaboration between Korteweg and de Vries -- An enquiry into personalities
snippet.description:
Title: The collaboration between Korteweg and de Vries -- An enquiry into personalities
Authors: Bastiaan Willink
Comments: 16 pages, 4 figures
Subjects: History and Philosophy of Physics (physics.hist-ph); Analysis of PDEs (math.AP); History and Overview (math.HO); Fluid Dynamics (physics.flu-dyn)
